narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Puyallup Tribal Opioid Clinic Inc. is a Clinic/Center  Rehabilitation  Substance Use Disorder provider based in Tacoma, WA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $8.0M in Medicaid payments across 27K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $8.0M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
